results.name: a(n) = 2*n^2 + 2*n - 1.
comment: Numbers k such that 2*k+3 is square.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
formula: a(n) = 3*( Sum_{k=1..n} k^5 )/( Sum_{k=1..n} k^3 ), n>0. - _Gary Detlefs_, Oct 18 2011
program: (Sage) [2*n^2 +2*n -1 for n in (0..50)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 01 2021
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Sep 19 2008
ext: Edited by the Associate Editors of the OEIS, Sep 02 2009
